channel.title: Looking for the right snare, send help
channel.description:
Auxy folks, it’s been a while since I last posted here. I’ve been taking some time and looking at the new drum layouts, and it’s kind of a doozy.
Anyways, I need some help. I’ve been searching nonstop for the closest drum snare that I can find that matches Frame’s snare when compressed. Unfortunately, compressing no longer exists, and finding the right snare is easier said than done, soooo...does anyone know what the closest sounding thing is?

item.title: Looking for the right snare, send help
item.dc:creator: Shepdoge
item.description:
I’ll check for some more later tonight

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for the right snare, send help

item.title: Looking for the right snare, send help
item.dc:creator: Shroak
item.description:
Ooh, that’s actually REALLY good. Decreasing the pitch also gives it more oomph, which I like. Any others?

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for the right snare, send help

item.title: Looking for the right snare, send help
item.dc:creator: Shepdoge
item.description:
How about Phat Snare 13 from Snaredrum Collection 2?

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for the right snare, send help
